ygData.msgSnippet: Cripes Bobby-boy.  You go! ... From: Bob Stewart  To: eqbards@onelist.com  Date: Thursday, July 15, 1999 3:18 PM
ygData.messageBody:
Cripes Bobby-boy. You go!


-----Original Message-----
From: Bob Stewart <dreambard@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, July 15, 1999 3:18 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Level 30,35,40,45, and a "power level" comme


>From: Bob Stewart <dreambard@...>
>
>At 10:49 AM 7/15/99 -0700, RON_TALBOT@... wrote:
>> What! gasp! You mean I'm not the only 30+ year old in the game...
>> Yea! There is hope for me after all...
>
>Hah! I laugh on your young lapel.
>
>I'm 51, married, and have 2 married sons who between them have 3 kids of
>their own. Both of them play EverQuest, too. Can anyone beat that?
>
>Neither of them wants to play a bard, but it other than old inertia to play
>a dwarf warrior, it was my obvious, enthusiastic choice.
>
> Bob
>
